author: awoodward@businessinsider.com (Aylin Woodward), Aylin Woodward
title: An unsubstantiated theory suggests the coronavirus accidentally leaked from a Chinese lab — here are the facts
description: Getty Experts think the coronavirus likely originated in bats, then may have jumped to an intermediary animal species before infecting humans. Chinese authorities suggested that animal-to-human jump occurred at a Wuhan wet market, but a growing body of resear…
content:
A key unanswered question about the coronavirus pandemic is how exactly it started — and when.
Most scientists agree that the virus originated in bats; one study found that it shares 96% of its genetic code with coronaviruses circulating in Chinese bat popul… [+10035 chars]
